about_the_game:
The squad who will spend their courage and strength for the sake of 4 kingdoms in this holy war will be chosen "Bravehood" by all kingdoms.

Be the Bravehood with your friends!


Fight, level up and loot with your team to banish enemies. Use relics and weapon arts to defeat enemies. Loot chests and kill mini-bosses for gathering new swords and armor.

Different Game Modes


You are a chosen knight sent to Hardingham. Your duty is to complete Dungeon Missions with your team. Also join the competition between the kingdoms and play The Tower, PvP Arena or Bounty Invading modes.

Shah Mat


Build your strategy, make your timing and execute to eliminate enemy teams.

Weapon Arts


Each weapon type has an upgradeable special attack. Short-swords can spin, mage wands can do lightning damage, scythes can summon minions and more...

Features

  • Long playtime with content
  • Game session up to 12 people
  • 15 enemies, 5 mini bosses and 3 bosses
  • Appealing graphics
  • Amazing sound design

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista 32-bit Service Pack 2
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2XXX @ 2.0GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Bravehood is a PvEvP dungeon crawler with co-op features. Form up your team and fight against the creatures and other teams for glory and treasure. Build your knight to become the best in Kingdom of Hardingham through other players.
